name: TheONE Expert Profile Embed
author: MindD

sections.description:
Let your visitors instantly contact your through live video via their browser or our app and get paid per minute for your services.

We enable you to show one or multiple profiles within your site with a call me now button for direct live video interaction. The profile shows:

  • Profile picture
  • Online / offline status
  • Short description
  • Job title
  • Spoken languages
  • Expertise
  • Price Per Minute

The widget is part of the calltheone.com platform where professionals and consumers can share their knowledge through live video interaction while being paid per minute. When using the widget, your profile will also be displayed at calltheone.com.

KEY FEATURES

  • Live video interaction
  • Earn money per minute while having a live video chat
  • Share screen during a video call
  • Call me back on my expenses button

SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS

This plugin requires an account at calltheone.com for both caller and receiver.

EXAMPLES

One profile: www.zitadusa.com/home-contact

PAYMENTS & EARNINGS

Every displayed profile shows a price per minute that the user decides with a minimum of 0,04 Euro. The caller automatically pays for every minute the call takes. Earning will be added to the wallet of the person being called. Callers need to have credits in their wallet. Credits can be added by topping-up the wallet within calltheone.com via multiple payment options.
sections.installation:
This plugin provides two ways of including your profile. A widget and a shortcode.

To install it:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/theone-embed directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use a shortcode: [theone user="{your-username}"] (without the {})
  4. Use the widget provided after installation, and fill out the user

For the user you need to fill out your personal url from your calltheone.com account. Follow these steps:

  1. If you haven’t already, create an calltheone.com. It’s free.
  2. Click on your profile pic in the menu >> your profile >> My Url.
  3. What you see after ‘calltheone.com/’ is what you fill out as ‘user’.
  4. You can personalize this by changing it to something that does not exist yet on calltheone.com
sections.faq:
What do I fill out as my ‘TheONE url’?

You need to fill out your personal url from your calltheone.com account. Follow these steps:

  1. If you haven’t already, create an calltheone.com. It’s free.
  2. Go to your profile -> My Url.
  3. What you see after ‘calltheone.com/’ is what you fill out as ‘user’.
  4. You can personalize this by changing it to something that does not exist yet on calltheone.com

Can I use this plugin without an account on calltheone.com?

No, this plugin only shows your profile from calltheone.com

Is a profile on calltheone.com free?

Yes, creating a profile is free.

Can I earn money with my calltheone.com profile?

Yes, you can set your own hourly rate and get paid by the minute by everyone that calls you for your expertise.

See calltheone.com for more information.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Embed your personal profile
  • Embed profiles of a certification
  • Set the width (optionally)

short_description: Add one or more profiles with a "Contact Me" button for direct live video interaction with site visitors.
